title: Haaland's First PL Hat Trick
description:
The FC crew recap Man City's come from behind over Crystal Palace as Jan Aage Fjortoft joins the show to break down fellow Norwegian Erling Haaland's hat trick performance. Plus, the guys review Chelsea, Liverpool, Arsenal and Man United's respective wins and analyze Yann Sommer's historic performance against Bayern Munich.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Haaland hat trick rescues Man City, Chelsea squeak past Leciester; Liverpool hang 9 goals on Bournemouth
